ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND(ISBLANK( Hon_Plant_Code_del__c ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Done')), OR($RecordType.Name = 'Orders',$RecordType.Name = 'Quotes',$RecordType.Name = 'OEM Quotes Orders',$RecordType.Name = 'ReturnsPRO'), $User.Id !='005300000042rPL', $User.Id !='005a0000007vvzm', $User.Id !='005300000042f5h', $User.Id !='005300000044CmQ', $User.Id !='0052D0000011O78', $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill as “No Plant” if the Hon Plant is not applicable.
